definition[0]: to appear or come out from somewhere
example[0]: The flowers emerge in the spring.
example[1]: The sun emerged from behind the clouds.
definition[1]: if facts emerge, they become known after being hidden or secret
example[3]: Later it emerged that the judge had employed an illegal immigrant.
definition[2]: to come out of a difficult experience
example[4]: She emerged from the divorce a stronger person.
definition[3]: to begin to be known or noticed
example[5]: a religious sect that emerged in the 1830s
example[6]: Local government has recently emerged as a major issue.
